subtitles.text: Q.Please give the title call to QUTE.
I think this might really be the first time I've been called QUTE!
Not really. They didn't say that to me at Takoyaki Raymond either.
You weren't in charge of QUTE?
No, I was not in charge of QUTE.
What was he in charge of?
Okay, so that's how it's going to be.
I'd like to move on to the three main elements of Flash Time.
This is the section where we ask you to introduce the three elements that affirm you.
Now, let's take a look at your 3 elements, Mr. Hori. Here you go!
You look like a bachelor group to working people.
Well, I don't like to go out much.
I don't like to go out so much, so I do all the things I can do at home.
What kind of games are these?
There are many, but the one I'm most addicted to.
I've died in my sleep playing Monster Hunter.
I've got Sun Break, but I've been playing it on the Switch since Rise.
I was playing it with the staff and performers of "Ohayo Asahi Saturday Desu" every day until morning.
We played games every day until morning.
It really is Ohayo Asahi, isn't it?
That's right! We played until the sun came up.
I was also addicted to Fortnite.
All the Hud members moved from MonHun to Fortnite.All the Hud members were moving from MonHun to Fortnite.
We played that all the way until the morning.
You know how much time you spend playing games?
But I moved to Fortnite in the middle of the day.
I ended up playing about 450 hours.
Did you like games before you got into MonHun?
But have you heard of PUBG, which is played on cell phones?
I was really into that kind of stuff.
But I also liked the lighthearted games on the switch.
The only game I got really into was MonHun.
I'm playing games with the staff at Bevy right now.
I've heard that you've been playing with the staff of Bebaby.
When you were working as Takoyaki Poverty, did you play games with other members?
But we were all geeks of some sort.
We were all in different genres.
I was really into bands and stuff, but
Karen was into music and arts...
We were all geeks in different genres.
That's why we didn't work together or anything.
Mario Kart with all the members?
Who was the strongest in Mario Kart?
It's like someone's running the other way.
Thank you very much for watching!
